Text: Today, I am thankful for the opportunity to serve my fellow Hoosiers as their Representative to Congress. I hope all of you enjoy this day of thanks. Happy Thanksgiving.pic.twitter.com/qyhotMirQR

Today, I stood for Hoosiers. I stood to ensure that they receive more of their hard-earned paychecks; I stood to ensure that a convoluted and archaic tax code was simplified; I stood to ensure that special interests deductions and loopholes were removed.pic.twitter.com/XTMDH1D81X
Before today's vote on #TaxReform, I have been answering the phones in Washington with staff to hear what Hoosiers have to say.pic.twitter.com/LtURjRxDgu

This week, we won a victory for Hoosiers against the Washington establishment. By passing the Presidential Allowance Modernization Act, we took much-needed steps toward cutting wasteful spending & fighting to ensure that career politicians don’t receive a taxpayer check for life.pic.twitter.com/uEzB5QgxlL

Last night, the House finalized passage of the National Defense Authorization Act. This legislation finally authorizes our war fighters to be resourced properly and receive a much-earned and long-overdue raise.pic.twitter.com/GRNGr62JBM

Today, we pause to thank & honor our veterans. These sentinels of freedom personify the words Alexander Hamilton once said, "There is a certain enthusiasm in liberty, that makes human nature rise above itself, in acts of bravery and heroism."pic.twitter.com/xMCT0JSaN4

Today, I am proud to honor the U.S. Marine Corps and all Marines throughout #IN09. For 242 years they have played a major role in defending our great Nation. Happy Birthday, Marines!pic.twitter.com/R7frkzIWGO
